name: The 9th International Conference on Research in Education, Teaching and Learning
content: Thus far, ICTLE has hosted participants from a diverse range of countries from all over the world. This conference functions as a platform for academics to potentially publish their work in esteemed indexed journals, establish connections for future research projects, enhance their expertise, and actively contribute to the advancement of education. ICTLE has earned recognition for offering exemplary programs and fostering a dynamic learning environment centered on accessible knowledge exchange and community development. For those unable to attend in person, there is an option for virtual presentations, allowing papers to be showcased during the conference and included in its proceedings. Following the event, authors of accepted abstracts who have registered will be encouraged to submit their full papers for potential publication in the Conference Proceedings, Peer-Reviewed Journals, or as a Monograph. Detailed submission instructions will be provided via email a few weeks after the conference. The Conference Proceedings will be assigned an ISBN number, and full paper submissions will undergo a double-blind review process. Accepted papers will be published electronically and assigned a DOI number. Attendees will also have the opportunity to participate in a complimentary guided city tour of Dublin, led by a local expert, to explore the cityâ€™s rich history and vibrant contemporary culture.
